name: 120 Seconds to Sparkle
description:
When thinking about "Awesome per second" for Extra Credit's 2018 Game Jam, Tefnek and Zircon's "Waste Water Wipeout" at OC Remix came immediately to mind.

In 120 seconds, collect as much sparkle as you can while enjoying the groove.

Other assets used:
Yughues Free Metal Materials
100+ Magic Particle Effects
FREE Casual Game SFX Pack
